primary

Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • primary.Navigation

  • public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Erik-Olivier Riendeau, 2016 Navigation class that contains useful methods for controlling the motors attached to the wheels.

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(double angle,
          boolean stop)
        Rotates the robot to a desired angle. Will use the shortest rotation to the desired angle and control the motors appropriately.
        Parameters:
        angle - - in degrees from 0 to 360
        stop - - if true, the robot stops after turning
